quotes.text: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Trust in the Lord with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.
quotes.author: King Solomon

quotes.text: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis
